title: Trump takes domestic violence "very seriously": White House
text:
Trump takes domestic violence "very seriously": White House 1:18pm IST - 01:18 
White House spokeswoman Sarah Sanders says President Trump and his administration take domestic violence ''very seriously'' and allegations should be investigated ''thoroughly.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
White House spokeswoman Sarah Sanders says President Trump and his administration take domestic violence "very seriously" and allegations should be investigated "thoroughly."
